SYNOPSIS:
Based on the enormously popular books by Helen Craig and Katharine Holabird Angelina Ballerina tells the timeless tales of a remarkable little mouse who dreams of becoming a prima ballerina. Headstrong passionate and feisty she is a character children of all ages will relate to.

Angelina's Surprise
Angelina is jealous of the attention the Pinkpaws twins are getting through their new baby brother. 

Treasure Tandems
There's a treasure hunt in Chipping Cheddar and all the young mouselings are hoping to win first prize a brand new shiny red tandem.

Alice's Present
Angelina accidentally loses the beautiful handmade gym bag Alice has made for her.

Rag Doll Ballerina
Angelina is feeling very grown up so decides her well-loved rag doll called Polka is too babyish to keep.

Mouse of the Year
Miss Lilly is crowned Teacher of the Year. But she leaves the ballet class in the less than capable hands of Miss Quaver.

Silver Locket
Angelina borrows her mothers precious locket for a party but disaster strikes! Angelina notices the locket is gone! 

Actor(s)/Artist(s): Judi Dench | Finty Williams | Keith Wickham
Director(s): Kitty Taylor | Roger McIntosh
Distributor: Roadshow
Number of Discs: 1
Running Time: 75 minutes
